name: @things-elements/things-scene-clone
description: An element providing a starting point for your own reusable Polymer elements.

scripts.serve: watchify src/*.js -o things-scene-clone.js src/index.js & polymer serve
scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -o things-scene-clone.js && uglifyjs things-scene-clone.js -o things-scene-clone-min.js
